DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct determine appropriate therapeutic dos BI 10773 Japanese patient T2DM first treatment period . The second treatment period require obtain sufficient safety data ( one-year exposure BI 10773 ) Japanese patient T2DM accord ICH E1 guideline .
DOC.brief_title: Empagliflozin ( BI 10773 ) Dose Finder Study Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus prior inform consent Male female patient diet exercise regimen : 1. drugnaïve , define antidiabetic drug 10 week prior inform consent . 2. pretreated one oral antidiabetic drug ; present antidiabetic therapy unchanged 10 week prior inform consent . HbA1c Visit 1a : 1. patient drug naïve : HbA1c > =7.0 = < 10.0 % 2. patient treat one oral antidiabetic drug : HbA1c > =6.5 = < 9.0 % HbA1c > =7.0 % = < 10 % Visit 2 ( start runin ) Exclusion criterion : Uncontrolled hyperglycaemia glucose level > 240 mg/dL ( > 13.3 mmol/L ) overnight fast washout/placebo runin period confirm second measurement ( day ) . Acute coronary syndrome , stroke transient ischaemic attack within 12 week prior inform consent Impaired renal function , define calculate eGFR < 60 ml/min ( MDRD formula ) screen and/or washout period and/or runin phase . Bariatric surgery within past 2 year gastrointestinal surgery induce chronic malabsorption Blood dyscrasia disorder cause hemolysis unstable Red Blood Cell ( e.g . malaria , babesiosis , haemolytic anemia ) Treatment antiobesity drug ( e.g . sibutramine , mazindol ) 12 week prior informed consent treatment time screen ( i.e . surgery , aggressive diet regimen , etc . ) lead unstable body weight
